languages.text: {n}Стоит вам возникнуть на пороге, как десяток глаз — и прицелов — немедленно упираются в вас. Гости церемонии более не притворяются мирными плакальщиками. Однако они явно глубоко потрясены.{/n}
{n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит вам возникнуть на пороге, как десяток глаз — и прицелов — немедленно упираются в вас. Гости церемонии более не притворяются мирными плакальщиками. Однако они явно глубоко потрясены.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, profoundly amazed.{/n}
{n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, profoundly amazed.{/n}
{n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}
{n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}
{n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你出现的时候，十几双眼睛与十几杆枪瞄准了你的方向。那些参加葬礼的海盗已经不再假装是来哀悼的宾客。不过，他们看到你的时候却惊呆了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你出现的时候，十几双眼睛与十几杆枪瞄准了你的方向。那些参加葬礼的海盗已经不再假装是来哀悼的宾客。不过，他们看到你的时候却惊呆了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En cuanto apareces, una docena de ojos con sus correspondientes armas se giran hacia ti. Los asistentes a la ceremonia ya no fingen ser deudos apesadumbrados. Sin embargo, quedan asombrados al verte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto apareces, una docena de ojos con sus correspondientes armas se giran hacia ti. Los asistentes a la ceremonia ya no fingen ser deudos apesadumbrados. Sin embargo, quedan asombrados al verte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}式に姿を見せると、十数人もの目と銃がこちらに向けられた。式の参列者たちは、もはや平和的な弔問客のふりはしていない。しかし、全員こちらを見て唖然としている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}式に姿を見せると、十数人もの目と銃がこちらに向けられた。式の参列者たちは、もはや平和的な弔問客のふりはしていない。しかし、全員こちらを見て唖然としている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sobald du auftauchst, schwenken ein Dutzend Augen – und Waffen – in deine Richtung. Die Gäste der Zeremonie geben nicht länger vor, friedliche Trauernde zu sein. Allerdings sind sie erstaunt, dich zu sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sobald du auftauchst, schwenken ein Dutzend Augen – und Waffen – in deine Richtung. Die Gäste der Zeremonie geben nicht länger vor, friedliche Trauernde zu sein. Allerdings sind sie erstaunt, dich zu sehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dès que vous arrivez, une dizaine de regards et d'armes se tournent dans votre direction ; les invités ont enfin décidé d'arrêter de faire semblant d'être en deuil. Ils semblent cependant très surpris de vous voir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dès que vous arrivez, une dizaine de regards et d'armes se tournent dans votre direction ; les invités ont enfin décidé d'arrêter de faire semblant d'être en deuil. Ils semblent cependant très surpris de vous voir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ortaya çıktığın anda bir düzine göz ve namlu sana doğru dönüyor. Törene katılan konuklar artık sakince yas tutan kimselermiş gibi davranmıyor. Ama seni gördüklerine afalladıkları belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you appear, a dozen eyes — and guns — shift in your direction. The guests of the ceremony no longer pretend to be peaceful mourners. They are, however, stunned to see you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ortaya çıktığın anda bir düzine göz ve namlu sana doğru dönüyor. Törene katılan konuklar artık huzurlu yas tutan kişilermiş gibi davranmıyor. Fakat seni gördüklerine şaşırmış hâldeler.{/n}
